price: Mos u dëshpëro nga fjalët e tyre! Ne e dimë çfarë fshehin dhe çfarë shpallin.
arabic: فَلَا يَحۡزُنكَ قَوۡلُهُمۡۘ إِنَّا نَعۡلَمُ مَا يُسِرُّونَ وَمَا يُعۡلِنُونَ

version.title: Albanian Translation - Hasan Nahi
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Albanian by Hasan Nahi, published by Albanian Institute of Islamic Thought and Civilization, printed in 2006.

meta.transliteration: falā yaḥzunka qawluhum innā naʿlamu mā yusirrūna wamā yuʿ'linūna
